Gareth Thomas took over from injured Brian O'Driscoll as British and Irish Lions captain in New Zealand in 2005

articles.title: Michael Bay clarifies ‘false’ claims in response to Megan Fox controversy - The Independent
articles.description: Transformers director praised ‘wonderful’ actor after she defended him following criticism
articles.content:
Michael Bay has praised Megan Fox for clarifying controversial comments she made about working with the director when she was 15.
